attributes.action: 1. Outlaw variable rate Mortgages. 2.Build blocks of affordable small apartments for first time buyers to purchase.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I passionately believe variable rate Mortgages are unfair and immoral.I also believe small apartments can be built for first time buyers at affordable prices. Quie a few companies build such bocks to let to students at £70 a week and they make it pay -so it can be done.
